==Useful Info==
'''Fannar the Cold-Hearted''' is a [[unique]] [[cold]]-themed [[list of deep elves|elf]], equipped with a [[staff]] of [[freezing]] and [[ring of ice]] (67%) or [[staff of cold]] (33%), as well as a [[robe]] of [[ego|cold resistance]]. They prefer to stay out of melee combat, summoning [[ice beast]]s to distract you while blasting you with [[Ice Magic]].

==Location==
*[[The Dungeon]]: 10-12
*The [[Orcish Mines]]: 1-2
*[[The Lair]]:1-3

{{monster spells}}

==Tips & Tricks==
*The difficulty of this fight is determined almost entirely by how much cold resistance you have. If you've got none (or even vulnerability!), you'll probably want to avoid fighting Fannar.
*Reading a [[scroll of silence]] will disable Fannar's most dangerous abilities, allowing you to engage them in melee in relative safety.
*The summoned ice beasts are distractions -- don't waste time killing them off if you don't have to. They'll all vanish as soon as Fannar falls.

==History==
*Fannar was male before [[0.24]].
*Prior to [[0.18]], Fannar knew [[Condensation Shield]], before that spell was removed.
*Prior to [[0.13]], Fannar knew Ozocubu's Armour in his 3rd spell slot, and was less willing to use his ice beasts as shields. 
*Fannar was added in [[0.11]], and was the first monster to explicitly generate with [[jewellery]].
